title: Here Are Some of the Many Tributes for Desmond Tutu, a Force for Harmony
content:
1. Here Are Some of the Many Tributes for Desmond Tutu, a Force for Harmony  The New York Times
  2. Desmond Tutu, anti-apartheid leader and voice of justice, dead at 90  CNN
  3. South Africa's Tutu - anti-apartheid hero who never stopped fighting for "Rainbow Nation"  Yahoo News
  4. Factbox: Reaction to the death of South Africa's Desmond Tutu  Reuters
  5. Desmond Tutu taught us all the true meaning of greatness  The Guardian
